name: Ireland

typical_paths.label: Ireland funds (informational)
bullets: High-level mapping of typical Irish fund pathways (e.g., AIF vs UCITS) depends on investor base and strategy.
Local rulebooks and authorisation processes must be reviewed with counsel/administrator.

marketing_notes: Cross-border marketing depends on AIFM/UCITS management company and investor jurisdictions.
Confirm local pre-marketing/marketing notification requirements where applicable.
requires_counsel_triggers: Any retail distribution or public offering.
Any complex strategy requiring special approvals/disclosures.
Any delegation or outsourcing arrangements with cross-border providers.
